name: If you should die before you wake
name_original: If you should die before you wake
description:
Joyful dreams or night terrors?
As their guardian angel, navigate an illogical and imaginative state of mind to protect as many children as you can from their nightmares! During the day you must craft and place traps to defend against the monsters that roam at night.

Controls:

WASD - Move the dinosaur around

Left Click - Shoot your magic dream catcher spell

Tab - Open crafting menu to build traps
